data: The two old men sat in the library, eyeing the blue envelope that lay on the end of the long table nearest the fireplace, where a merry but unnoticed blaze crackled in the vain effort to cry down the shrieks of the bleak December wind that whistled about the corners of the house.
browsing: culture/civilization/society|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: novels|category: american literature
